text:
SVGGeneratorContext.doubleString fails (NullPointer) the first time it is 
called and needs to access the decimalFormat variable. It appears that this 
variable is getting set to decimalFormats[3] before decimalFormats[3] is 
initialized. There is {...} construct at the bottom of the file that initiates 
the array. Should this {...} construct be static?
creator: jhenley@voyence.com
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
This was fixed right after the 1.5 release. If you download 1.5.1rcx, you'll see
the fix.
